formatted_address: 1 HarbourFront Walk, #01-23 & #B2-23, 1 HarbourFront Walk, #B2-23 VivoCity, Singapore 098585
name: FairPrice Xtra VivoCity

reviews.text:
A spacious and well-organized supermarket that offers a wide variety of groceries, household items, and fresh produce. The store is clean and well-lit, making it easy to navigate through different sections. The range of products is impressive, including international brands and local goods, with competitive prices that cater to a variety of budgets.

The fresh produce section is particularly noteworthy, with an extensive selection of fruits, vegetables, and meats. The store also offers ready-to-eat meals and a good assortment of organic products. The staff is friendly and helpful, and the self-checkout counters make the shopping process faster and more convenient.

The store is conveniently located at VivoCity, so it’s ideal for combining grocery shopping with other activities in the mall.

Very useful FairPrice as it’s located in the very busy VivoCity mall and is pretty big with 2 floors. There’s your typical snacks, beverages, hygiene products, fruits, vegetables, meat, fish sections and way more smaller or bigger sections. Aisles are very organized, the whole FairPrice is quite clean, quite a few staff all around and very friendly as well. I’ve come here multiple times and always had a good experience.

Lotte Mart serves delicious ready to eat Korean street food! The cashier was also very courteous and patient!
Also love the wide variety of snacks!
Apart from Lotte Mart, I also love the wide range of Hams from Culina and the staff is always ready to assist to slice it to the desired thickness.

Stunning two-story supermarket
A local large supermarket, FairPrice guarantees the best prices, and the whole style is completely different from the FairPrice opened in the neighborhood. There is even a bakery (swee heng 1989), a coffee shop, and a specially planned seat in the deli area so that consumers can buy and eat immediately. There are all kinds of fresh fruits and vegetables, and the store is bright and spacious, without a sense of oppression.

All you need are here. From medicines, supplements, groceries, ready to eat food. All are available. They even have a place to enjoy your food. Has three floors of goodies to choose your next favorite food or
Items.

vicinity: 1 HarbourFront Walk, #01-23 & #B2-23, 1 HarbourFront Walk, #B2-23 VivoCity, Singapore
